add your account and attend congress vot: Register your account & attend to voting

enter your passphrase: Please enter your password to set up.
passphrase should be 12 characters which: Password have to include upper case, lower case and special character . It's length have to be more than 12 characters.
please keep your secret seed safely: Please keep your secret key in safe place, or you have in danger to lose your digital asset
To create your account, depositing over: After more than 1BOS deposited, Create account process will be finished
joining membership and then attend congr: Join membership & participate congress voting. Get benefit from it.
privacy text: User agree on ${privacyPolicyLink} for the purpose of service usage
please keep your recovery key safely: Please keep your recovery key in safe, this will use for account importing.
do not use the account no longer: If you do not use account any longer?
please back the account up before deleti: If user deleted his account without back-up, Account restoration is unavailable
please read following before deregisteri: Please check guideline before cancel your membership
deregistirng membership warning message: When your membership cancelled, Your present membership can not re-use or recover.
Your vote will be void in case of membership cancellation.
All membership information will be terminated after membership cancellation
If you want to change membership account changed, you have to membership cancel and register it again.
During on going congress voting, Users impossible to membership cancellation for vote total count till congress voting ends.
something is wrong: error occured. please wait and try again.
registering membership guide: User must freeze more than 10,000 BOScoin unit so as to be qualified congress voting participant.  User will be able to get proportional reward ro BOScoin freezing amount after the Frozen reward voting passed.
freezing should be 10,000 bos at least: Freezing BOScoin available only multiples of ten thousands BOScoin unit
you can get rewards by frozen amount: User will be got proportional reward to BOScoin freezing amount.
freezing is not cancelable, you should u: Freezing 요청 후에는 취소가 불가능하며 Unfreezing을 통해 해지됩니다
identity verification could take hours: It will be took time at least minutes to hours
now you can attend congress voting: You can attend the Congress voting from now on.
membership guide message 1: If user possessed less than 10,000 BOScoin unit, Congress voting qualification will be dismissed & only Pre-membeship qualified.
membership guide message 2: User can not cancel his membership during voting period
you can withdraw after unfreezing: You will be able to withdrawal your BOScoin to {account} on {until} approximnately .
unfreezing is not cancelable, you can wi: Unfreezing set back is unable. User can withdrawal BOScoin after 14days
currently only one account allowed. If y: You can register only 1 account at the moment. If you wanted add another account, please remove existed account.
by registering an membership you agree t: I, BOScoin holder, fully agree that the node operating privilege shall be delegated to the BlockchainOS by gained acquiring membership.
